'''Su Klukka Heljar''' ("That Bell of Hell") is an Icelandic song by [[E.V. Gordon]], to be sung to the tune of ''The Bells of Hell''. It is published as the 18th song in ''[[Songs for the Philologists]]'' in [[1936]].

==The song==
<poem style="font-style:italic; margin-left:20px;">
'''Su Klukka Heljar'''

Su klukka heljar hryngur-ryngur-ryng
       Fyr þjer en ekki mjer;
Fyr mj er engillinn syngur-ryngur-ryng,
       Hann heitir goðu mjer.
O Dauði, hvar þinn stingur-ringur-ring,
       O Gröf, er sigur hjer?
Su klukka heljar hryngur-ryngur-fyng —
       Fyr þjer en ekki mjer.
</poem>

[[Category:Poems and songs in Songs for the Philologists]]
